talk137:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You should come to our shop! We'll dye
your clothes and stuff! <sp:5:1:0>Stylish, huh?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I mean, I won't do it. That's my dad's thing. Still.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:3:0:2:0400>Oops, gotta go! I'm supposed to be
helping at the shop!
talk120:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Who wants to know?! Is there something
wrong with studying in secret? Huh?!
talk138:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What do you want? I'm supposed to be
helping out at the shop. If I show up all
soaked through, I'm gonna get it!
talk122:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, Professor Link! Hey there!<sp:0:4:0>Are you on the way to school too?
We'd better hurry if we don't wanna
get soaked!
talk123:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Can't we talk at school? Better there than
in the middle of this rain!
talk63:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh yeah? And you're still traveling this
late at night? Phew.<sp:0:4:0>I like having fun at night too, but I've also
got school tomorrow, so I'll have to catch
you next time.
talk64:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh yeah? You're just out around town at
night for no reason, huh?<sp:0:4:0>Kinda suspicious, but I don't have time to
get to the bottom of this. I got school
tomorrow, so I'll catch you next time.
talk66:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wow, and you've come to watch our
class? Well, it's starting soon!<sp:0:4:0>I get a little nervous at the idea that
someone's gonna be watching us today.
talk110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I gotta get to sleep so I'm ready for
school tomorrow. Goodnight, professor!
talk50:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Sure thing! Come by our class again
whenever if you feel like it!
talk129:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>They all look pretty interesting, so it's
tough to decide.
talk111:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Hey! You were at our class!<sp:0:4:0>Thanks for showing us what the Ancient
Hero looked like!<sp:0:4:0>The designs people thought up in those
days have a different feel to what we see
nowadays. I like 'em!<sp:0:4:0>I think I'll tell my dad about it!
talk113:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The monster curry you made for us had...
I guess you'd call it an interesting flavor.<sp:0:4:0>And as soon as I saw the color, suddenly
I wasn't hungry anymore.<sp:0:4:0>It's kinda neat how colors can affect the
mind like that. I should tell my dad.
talk114:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Which one do I read today? <sp:5:0:0>Hmm...<sp:0:4:0>Oh, this "History of the Sheikah Tribe"
book looks good. <sp:5:1:0>Let's see...<sp:5:0:0> Here we go.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>"The Sheikah tribe was known for their
wisdom, as expressed by their love for
learning and technology.<sp:0:4:0>"That technology was instrumental in
sealing away the Calamity of 10,000
years ago.<sp:0:4:0>"However, their knowledge was also seen
as a threat to the security of the kingdom,
and they were exiled.<sp:0:4:0>"Eventually, the Sheikah who harbored
grudges against the kingdom gathered to
form the Yiga Clan.<sp:0:4:0>"To this day, they work from the shadows
to destroy the kingdom."<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Whoa! Aren't the Sheikah tribe those
people in Kakariko Village to the
northwest of here?<sp:0:4:0>They all seem like good folks. I didn't
know there was an evil version of them
too. <sp:5:1:0>Hm?
talk54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Nice evening, huh? Wait...do I know
you, mister?
talk96:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Nice evening, huh? Oh...aren't you the
guy I met before? Who were you again?
talk55:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh yeah? You got good taste if you
wandered here to Hateno Village.
talk97:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, Professor Link! I know you want to
talk and all, but...<sp:0:4:0>I'm supposed to be helping at the shop,
so I gotta get going.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>That's the dye shop, by the way. If you
get bored with how your clothes look,
come try us out!<sp:0:4:0>Our place is really colorful, so you can't
miss it!
talk118:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Wait, didn't you just talk to me? It's still
raining! If you wanna talk, we can do it
somewhere dry!
talk98:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>If you're curious about our dye shop,
then follow me!
talk100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're interested in dyeing your clothes
or working with fabrics, talk to my dad.<sp:0:4:0>He's got really good taste, so you'll
recognize him as soon as you see him!
talk119:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What theâ€” Where did you come from?!
Don't startle me!
talk99:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, Professor Link! Greetings and
salutations! <sp:5:1:0>I mean, saturations!
talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Wakeup>*yawn* Hey, mister.<sp:0:4:0>I'm tired, and I've got school tomorrow,
so let's play some other time.
talk82:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh! Hey, Professor Link!<sp:0:4:0>Are you on the way to school too? Let's
get a move on so we're not late!
talk83:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hurry, Professor Link! Or else we're
gonna be late for school!
talk84:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Need me for somethin', mister? Hey, if
you wanna talk, can we do it at school?
I hate gettin' wet.
talk85:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Hm? Wait, didn't I just see you, mister?
Who were you again?
talk88:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh! Hey, Professor Link! Are you subbing
for our class today too?<sp:0:4:0>I hope so. Your lessons are fun and easy
to understand, so I get excited to learn.
talk47: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Not gonna tell me, huh? All right.
talk131:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Thanks for coming here even in the rain!
Are you a traveler?
talk70:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Our shop is all about style. Everyone
who's interested in fashion comes here
all the time.<sp:0:4:0>And we don't just dye clothes! We can do
stuff with other fabrics too!<sp:0:4:0>My dad can tell you all about it. He's got
really good taste, so you'll recognize him
as soon as you see him!
talk108:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huh? Oh... Aren't you the guy I met
before? Who were you again?
talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Uh, mister, can this not wait? Class is
about to start!<sp:0:4:0>Why don't you watch Professor Symin's
lecture with the rest of us?
talk71:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ahhh, then you must be a Cece fan! Here
to pay your respects or something?
talk132:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Hey, Professor Link! Greetings and
salutations! <sp:5:1:0>I mean, saturations!<sp:0:4:0>Glad you could make it even though
it's raining!
talk109:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, Professor Link. Nice evening, huh?
What are you doing out this late?<sp:0:4:0>Never mind. I'm tired, so I should get to
sleep soon. Goodnight, professor!
talk31: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Sorry, mister!<sp:0:4:0>Ask someone else! I'm in a hurry!
talk133:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Gaaah... If you wanna talk, can we go
somewhere that has a roof?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm in a hurry anyway. I'm supposed to
be helping out at the shop.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>That's the dye shop, by the way. If you
get bored with how your clothes look,
come try us out!<sp:0:4:0>Or just come in for shelter from the rain.
That's fine too! Our place is really
colorful, so you can't miss it!
talk134:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Which one do I read today? <sp:5:0:0>Hmm...<sp:0:4:0><sp:5:1:0>Oooh, there's one called "The Champions
and Their Divine Beasts." <sp:5:1:0>Let's see...<sp:5:0:0>
Here we go.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>"Divine Beasts were mechanical
weapons built 10,000 years ago to
fight the Calamity.<sp:0:4:0>"They were the size of mountains and
incredibly strong, meaning that not just
anyone was allowed to handle them.<sp:0:4:0>"Only the Championsâ€”specially chosen
representatives of each peopleâ€”were
permitted to control them.<sp:0:4:0>"By their efforts was the Calamity
stopped.<sp:0:4:0>"When the Calamity returned as foretold
100 years ago, the Divine Beasts were
seen once again.<sp:0:4:0>"A new set of Champions came forward to
use them.<sp:0:4:0>"Unfortunately, the Calamity seized
control of the Divine Beasts, and the new
Champions lost their lives in the process."<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ouch...<sp:5:0:0>that's a pretty sad story.<sp:0:4:0>But when I was little, I heard the Divine
Beasts went back into action, so I bet the
Champions' souls are at peace. Hm?
talk135:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Bwah! Who are you? Don't sneak up on
me like that!
talk136:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What theâ€” Professor Link?! Where did
you come from? Don't startle me!
talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, mister. I know you want to talk and
all, but...<sp:0:4:0>I'm supposed to be helping at the shop,
so I gotta get going.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>That's the dye shop, by the way. If you
get bored with how your clothes look,
come try us out!<sp:0:4:0>Our place is really colorful, so you can't
